section.name: 10 steps to write a cartridge
section.p: This article shows you how to write an AndroMDA cartridge in 10 distinct steps, using a sample cartridge which generates an Ant-like build script from a UML deployment model. This is why the tutorial cartridge is called "andromda-deployment".

section.name: Writing deployment descriptors
section.p: This item should describe how cartridge.xml, metafacades.xml and profile.xml are written.
